#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define mod 1000000007
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        int pi,yi,i;
        long long p;
        scanf("%d%d",&pi,&yi);
        p=pi;
            while(yi>2000)
            {
                p=p*p;
                p=p%mod;
                yi--;
            }
        printf("%lld\n",p);
    }
    return 0;
}
